part 2 of my study 
today we will talk about buyer box 
What is buyer box on Amazon?
The Amazon buy box is a section on the right side of an Amazon product detail page where customers can add a product to their cart or ‚Äúbuy now.‚Äù ... Each product on Amazon has its own product detail page, which can include the same products from different sellers
 
 
How do I get the buy box on Amazon?
5 ways to win the Buy Box on Amazon
Sell products in a new condition. Typically, the seller who wins the Buy Box will offer a new version of the product. ...
Offer competitive pricing. Amazon equates low prices with happy customers. ...
List as a Prime seller. ...
Keep strong inventory levels. ...
Maintain positive seller feedback.
 
What is buy box in Amazon seller?
The Buy Box refers to the white box on the right side of the Amazon product detail page, where customers can add items for purchase to their cart. Not all sellers are eligible to win the Buy Box.
What is a good buy box percentage on Amazon?
There's no definitive answer as to what Amazon considers a good buy box percentage. However, top brands could have 70% of the buy box, and other sellers could have 50%, and still consider it a good percentage for them. In contrast, anything below 20% is often a low/poor buy box percentage.
 
How do I know if I have the buy box?
How to Check Buy Box Eligibility:
Click on the Inventory tab in Amazon Seller Central and select Manage Inventory.
Click on the Preferences tab.
In the Column Display section, locate the field for Buy Box Eligible.
Select Show When Available from the drop-down menu.
 
Does Amazon rotate the buy box?
Amazon will rotate the buy box among the sellers who are eligible for the buy box. That rotation will depend on Amazon's algorithm, but it generally rotates according to all the sellers who are priced competitively, typically within a percentage of the current buy box price.

day 3 for a new post no 3 
today we will talk about 3 pl 
What is a 3PL?

.A company's utilisation of a third-party business to outsource aspects of its fulfilment and logistics services is known as third-party logistics (abbreviated 3P

Order fulfilment companies are third-party suppliers who fill orders for other businesses such as online sellers, eCommerce businesses, and even brick-and-mortar retailers that lack their own warehouse and distribution infrastructure.

Since its founding in 2006, 3P Logistics has been effectively fulfilling orders for a wide range of retail and wholesale customers. Industry expertise and simple access to an ever-expanding selection of value-added support services come with our continual evolution. We'll create and agree on a solution based on your activity profile, company goals, and a long-term cooperation when you collaborate with 3P Logistics.

At3PL professionals are at the heart of our service offering, with knowledge and insight based on years of industry experience and a genuine desire to fulfil orders...We've created our own supply chain "ecosystem" with user ease in mind, giving clients access to a full range of end-to-end support from a single source of supply. Our services are supported by our own proprietary web-based technology solutions that provide users with real-time visibility of activities and inventory status on demand, from freight imports to end-user delivery.

The demand for flexible outsourced warehousing and logistics has never been higher, because to growing rent and labour expenses. Outsourcing all non-core activities is becoming more popular, allowing you and your team to focus on what you do best. for yours bussinesses

‚ÄúLaunching a Private Label product is not as simple as it sounds, there are multiple steps to be taken pre and post launch in order to make it successful and to avoid any hassles in future.‚Äú
Here are a few short but important measures to be taken before and during launch:
1. Create a Master Keyword List (MKL)
¬∑ Select the top 10-15 sellers having high sales and put their ASINs on Amazon Search Bar in the sequence ASIN1|ASIN2|ASIN3‚Ä¶
¬∑ Run H10 Xray on the search results and extract Keywords through Cerebro Reverse ASIN. Filter these keywords and keep those with high search volume and high relevancy.
¬∑ Use these keywords to track the competitors, add them in your content and target these in PPC.
2. Set Launch Date and Offer Start Date in future when product is expected to go live to preserve the Honeymoon period.
3. Make sure that FBA fees is the same as you estimated by checking in inventory tab. If it‚Äôs not then open case and ask for re-measurement once product is live.
4. Structure your PPC Campaigns smartly:
¬∑ Make exact campaigns targeting the keywords from MKL sorted by search volume.
¬∑ Determine the number of campaigns to be made from your revenue and margins. For instance, expected revenue of 30 days is 2700$ (5 sales a day * 18$), and at 30% profit margin i.e. 810$, you can aim to spend this on PPC and make campaigns accordingly.
¬∑ Set campaign budget 10-30$ per campaign but you can adjust it according to the bid rate of your keyword.
¬∑ Do not target more than 8 keywords per campaign or none of them will work effectively.
¬∑ Bid 5-10% higher than suggested bid and bid down only.
These were a few tips to launch a product effectively, but product stats, market trends and competition play a vital role in the results, if the product selection is up to the mark, these will surely prove to be beneficial.
Best Regards,
MUHAMMAD BILAL

TOPIC:

What is BSR?

BSR stand for Best Seller Rank.

BSR, or Best Sellers Rank is sometimes called "Selles rank" and is the score that is assigned to products based on historical sales data. The Amazon algorithm automatically calculates this ranking by using the number of recent sales and historical sales data relative to other products in the same category.

Benefits of Best Seller Rank

We can check demand through best seller rank.

Amazon updates it an hourly basis by their sales velocity.

We can check the design which product has good BSR

and copy it for launching our own product for private

label.

We can compare with other product which one is generating good sale.

We can check high ranked listing through best seller.

How we can check Monthly sales through BSR

USE JUNGLE SCOUT SALES ESTIMATOR

Where it shows on Amazon

1) Go to Amazon page

2) Click on listing

3) Product detail

So here we can see best seller rank with Number. The category is also shows here.Copy BSR number and paste in jungle scout sales estimator you can see how many estimated units are sold in a month.
EACH CATEGORY HAS ITS OWN BSR RANGES

LOWER BSR=good sales

HIGHER BSR=GENERATE LOW SALES # #

Hello,

Greetings from bilal

Let's take a quick look at PL and go through its entire cycle.

What is Private Label (PL)?

Private Labelling (PL) is when we launch our own brand with our own logos on items and packaging. PL assists you in creating a Digital Asset that you can flip at any time to generate wealth.

All investors interested in doing private label in the near future should be aware of the following:


PL (Private Label)

What is Amazon Listing Hijacking?

While examining your listings, you realize that there were two offers on one of your listings‚Ä¶how could that be?

Easy, someone saw a product that was selling. They felt they could effortlessly copy (counterfeit) and do an Amazon Listing Hijacking without giving a rip about ethics.

When this occurs, these sellers will contest with you on price and drive you out of the buy box. That cuts off your advertising and kills sales.

Here‚Äôs the worst part.

The product quality is likely not going to be as good. So when a customer buys a cheap rip-off product from China, they are probably going to be unhappy with it.

Keep learning
Happy selling
